job_tasks.phrase: Build and maintain new ETL solutions and calculation engines.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering task of building and maintaining data processing pipelines and calculation logic, which are integral parts of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Implement a new architecture to deliver data to the Credit Risk Datawarehouse applications.
job_tasks.justification: This involves designing and implementing software architecture for data delivery, a fundamental software engineering activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Improving stability, performance, and reliability of the Credit Risk applications.
job_tasks.justification: Enhancing the non-functional aspects of software applications (stability, performance, reliability) is a key software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Whatever software you develop, you own it and support it in the full lifecycle of your product.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes end-to-end responsibility for software development, a core tenet of software engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Therefore, your software requires to be trustworthy and you are keen to be the best in class to learn and apply security standards.
job_tasks.justification: Focusing on software trustworthiness and applying security standards is a crucial aspect of secure software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Build scalable deployment pipelines, to support Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery.
job_tasks.justification: Building CI/CD pipelines is a direct responsibility within operations and MLOps/DevOps practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Automate test and make it part of the design, code, build and release process.
job_tasks.justification: Automating testing within the software development lifecycle (design, code, build, release) falls under operations and MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Own your product and know how your product(s) are performing implementing the required Observability/Monitoring.
job_tasks.justification: Implementing observability and monitoring for product performance is a key responsibility in operations and MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Optimization of the service stability and continuity.
job_tasks.justification: This task focuses on improving the operational aspects of services, which is a software engineering concern related to reliability and uptime.

job_tasks.phrase: Enhance the CI/CD maturity, move to a containerized environment, prepare for the move to the public cloud etc.
job_tasks.justification: These are all operational and infrastructure-related tasks aimed at improving the deployment and operational environment, fitting into MLOps/DevOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Help Credit Risk to make big steps to the future.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates a strategic contribution to the business unit's future development, aligning technical work with business goals.

job_tasks.phrase: In short, we expect you to have or help us have a vision on how to provide our services in the future.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need for strategic thinking and vision setting for future service delivery, which is a business understanding aspect.

job_tasks.phrase: We are looking for an communicative DEV Engineer
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly states the need for communication skills.

job_tasks.phrase: We expect you to share and teach your knowledge to other team members as well.
job_tasks.justification: This points to knowledge sharing and teaching, which are key aspects of communication and collaboration within a team.

soft_skills.phrase: share and teach your knowledge to other team members as well.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses heavily on traditional software engineering tasks such as building and maintaining ETL solutions, implementing architectures, improving application stability, and managing the full software lifecycle. It also emphasizes DevOps practices like CI/CD, automated testing, and observability. While it mentions 'big data' and 'calculations', there is no mention of AI/ML models, generative AI, LLMs, prompt engineering, or related specialized AI tasks. Therefore, the role is classified as a Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the responsibilities and technologies. It explicitly states the core tasks are related to software development, ETL, architecture, and DevOps practices, with no indication of AI/ML model development or integration. The technologies listed are also standard software engineering tools.
